# Slide, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 192

This spell functions like *[[Slide (Spell)|slide]],* except as described above, and you can slide the subject creature 20 feet in a straight line. This movement likewise does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
